description:
Bolstered with technical features, the Sörmland Trousers are made of Fjallraven’s G-1000 Eco fabric. The blend of recycled polyester and cotton disperses moisture and lets you move silently through the woods. The waist is cut high in the back for coverage when sitting or kneeling and pockets give you access to tools and gadgets without having to stop to get retrieve them from your pack.

  • Made from wind-resistant, water-shedding G-1000 Eco that moves moisture outward
  • Waist is cut high at the back for sitting and comfort under a pack
  • 2 hand pockets 1 knife pocket and 2 buttoned back pockets
  • Tapered legs fit inside boots and reduce whiffling as you walk
  • Regular fit with a mid-waist rise
name: Fjallraven Sormland Tapered Trousers - Men's
